settings_tab.delete_org_modal.please_con.string: Please confirm that you wish to permanently delete the {orgName} Figma organization and all data associated with it and its users. We will process this request within 30 days.

settings_tab.delete_org_modal.enter_name.string: Enter names or emails of users that you’d like to delete. Their access to Figma and all data associated with their account will be deleted. This can’t be undone.

settings_tab.delete_org_modal.you_re_del.string: You’re deleting Figma data and access for the following user(s) in your organization:

settings_tab.delete_org_modal.are_you_su.string: Are you sure you'd like to delete Figma?

settings_tab.delete_org_modal.email_or_n.string: Email or names of org members

org_settings.autogen_password_controls.d.string: Choose an option for creating passwords for files.

org_settings.autogen_password_controls.c.string: People can create passwords or use autogenerated ones.

org_settings.autogen_password_controls.a.string: People can only use autogenerated passwords.

org_settings.autogen_password_controls.b.string: Note: If security is top of mind for your organization, we recommend using autogenerated passwords. These passwords combine 4 randomly-chosen words so they’re strong and unique, every time.

settings_tab.scim_metadata_modal.change_.string: Change which SCIM metadata shows on the members tab

settings_tab.connected_apps.scopes_grant.string: {numScopes, plural, one {1 scope included} other {{numScopes} scopes included}}

settings_tab.connected_apps.this_org_doe.string: {orgName} does not have any connected apps.

settings_tab.connected_apps.instruction.string: Your admins have given the following apps access to your organization. You can revoke an app’s access at any time.

settings_tab.connected_apps.scope_descri.string: The following scopes describe what this app can access from your organization:

settings_tab.connected_apps.are_you_sure.string: {appName} will no longer have access to the {orgName} organization.

settings_tab.connected_apps.error_loadin.string: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Refresh and try again

settings_tab.connected_apps.an_error_occ.string: An error occurred while deleting the token.

settings_tab.pinned_plugins_description.string: Pin plugins to be shown at the top of the inspect panel.

settings_tab.pinned_plugins_downgrade_wa.string: {noteLabel} Pinned plugins are now a feature of the Enterprise plan. You can still reorder or remove plugins from the list below, but to add them, you need to upgrade your plan.
